name: Sync Up!
description:
Sync Up! is a word association game played with a partner. Challenging and fun, Sync Up! will get the wheels in your head turning. See if you and your partner are in sync. You'll be surprised by how many times you are NOT!

Play it with a large group, or no group at all. Sync Up! delivers hours of endless fun! The best party starter, all in your pocket!
